CITY OF NEW YORK
MUNICIPAL BROADCASTING SYSTEM
MUNICIPAL BUILDING
NEW YORK 7, N.y.
WORTH 2-5600
SEYMOUR N. SIEGEL
Director
JOHN DE PROSPO
Executive Officer
WNyC-FM
October 6, 1950
Mr. Richard B# Hull
W0I, Iowa State College
Ames, Iowa
Dear Dicks
I was shocked to learn of the passing of Ed Heilman. !Ihis
apparently happened more than a month ago, but I certainly think
that Paulu ought to include some sort of a tribute to the guy
in the next issue of -the "News-Letter." When they begin to pop
off in their forties, no one can claim that educational radio
is less onerous than the commercial variety.
With all best wishes, I am
Seymour N. siegel
Director
SNSsas
Tfie Voice Of Tlie City
